list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a living organism of the kind exemplified by trees, shrubs, herbs, grasses, ferns, and mosses, typically growing in a permanent site, absorbing water and inorganic substances through its roots, and synthesizing nutrients in its leaves by photosynthesis using the green pigment chlorophyll.
a place where an industrial or manufacturing process takes place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the company has 30 plants in Mexico
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công ty có 30 nhà máy ở Mexico

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person placed in a group as a spy or informer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we thought he was a CIA plant spreading disinformation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi nghĩ rằng anh ấy là một cây CIA lây lan không tin

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place (a seed, bulb, or plant) in the ground so that it can grow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we planted a lot of fruit trees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi trồng rất nhiều cây ăn quả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: place or fix in a specified position.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she planted a kiss on his cheek
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã hôn lên má anh ấy
